sentences.sentence: You see it in the weatherworn stones of turreted castles.
sentences.translation: 在古堡塔楼那些风雨侵蚀的石块上，你会看到历史的印记。

sentences.sentence: He pointed to the turreted nunnery that could be seen on the mountainside.
sentences.translation: 他指了指在山上望得见的有塔楼的寺院。

sentences.sentence: Its eyes are turreted and can be moved independently so that it can view two different objects simultaneously!
sentences.translation: 它的眼睛是旋转式的，能够个别转动，如此一来它可以同时注视两个不同的物体！
